name: Right to Repair (pagemur4)
description:
Right to Repair is a short Gameboy adventure game in which you reassemble a broken Gameboy to progress.

Made in a few days for GBJam9 and GBCompo21 using GBStudio. Available to play in browser or for download as a Gameboy ROM.

CONTROLS:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift
